pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-geoip============python-geoip is a library that provides access to GeoIP databases.Currently it only supports accessing MaxMind databases. It's similar toother GeoIP libraries but comes under the very liberal BSD license andalso provides an extra library that optionally ships a recent version ofthe Geolite2 database as provided by MaxMind.Documentation is available at https://python-geoip-yplan.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
